issue.title: [Python][Dataset] Consider adding Cast like operation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8212](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8212). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would cast an expression to the datatype of another expression. 

Re-evalutate once the new LogicalPlan implementation is merged.
